DOC.detailed_description: PANTHER register phase I/randomised phase II trial patient recurrent metastatic colorectal cancer . The phase II part study randomise , control , 2 arm trial . Patients randomise : receive AZD8931 ( EGFR/ERBB inhibitor ) combination FOLinic acid , Fluorouracil IRInotecan ( FOLFIRI ) , FOLFIR alone ( control group ) . Treatment give two-weekly cycle . Phase II 's primary objective evaluate efficacy AZD8931 plus FOLFIRI alongside FOLFIRI alone use percentage change tumour size baseline 12 week start treatment .
